title: JSON schema for the Ajs Web Application builder configuration file

ignoredProjects.description: Specifies projects to be ignored from processing

projectIgnore.description: removes the complete Visual Studio project from the processing (valid for config defined within the project)

jsSourceFolder.description: specifies source folder for javascript files (usually TypeScript compiled output)

wwwRootSourceFolder.description: specifies the wwwroot folder of the project to be processed (the folder with all sources except compiled js files)

targetWebServer.description: target web server (the web.config / .htaccess files are updated automatically with virtual directories containing source files)

sourcesPath.description: path where virtual directories for project sources will be created (the map file must reflect this). Valid for Debug configuration only

enableSourceMaps.description: specifies if generation / transferring of source maps is allowed. Valid for Debug configuration only.

jsCreateProjectFolder.description: specifies if the folder with the project name will be created in the target javascript folder

offlineSupport.description: specifies if the cache.manifest file will be generated

offlineFiles.description: specifies file url's to be cached in the application cache

jsMinify.description: specifies if JavaScript files will be minified

cssMinify.description: specifies if CSS resources will be minified

htmlMinify.description: specifies if HTML resources will be minified
